alert.note: Alert for Menominee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 29 at 4:08PM EDT until March 30 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of one tenth to two tenths of an inch tonight into Wednesday morning. * WHERE...Menominee County. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 1 PM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The main part of the storm will be the mixed precipitation tonight into Wednesday morning. Light snow will occur for Wednesday night into Thursday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
